name: Hallow's Rise
description:
Hallow's Rise is a game where you play as a cloaked cat exploring autumn woods, clearing out any monsters you find on the way.

CONTROLS

WASD to move
Left click to use an item
Q to throw the item out of your inventory

GAMEPLAY

Move through the roguelike levels to the end of the zone, where you will be greeted with a campfire that can be used to upgrade your items with the help of a mushroom. Fight a variety of enemies and collect an array of different items each with special uses. There is no end game right now since it was just for a jam, but possibly one coming soon!
